about.title: About Us
about.intro: The Volunteer Activity Information System is a platform that brings together volunteers, coordinators, and donors to address socially important issues.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Improving Lives Through Volunteering
mission.description: We strive to create an effective ecosystem for volunteer projects that maximizes their positive impact on society.

history.title: Our History
history.content: The platform was created in 2023 in response to the growing need for coordination of volunteer efforts in Ukraine. We started with a small group of enthusiasts and quickly grew into a national network connecting thousands of volunteers, hundreds of projects, and dozens of organizations.

values.title: Our Values
values.transparency.desc: We ensure complete transparency regarding the goals, funding, and results of all projects.
values.respect.desc: We value the contribution of each participant and respect the diversity of opinions and approaches.
values.impact.desc: We focus on projects with measurable and meaningful social impact.
values.innovation.desc: We seek new approaches to solving social problems and continually improve our platform.
values.community.desc: We build a strong community of like-minded people united by common goals and values.
values.responsibility.desc: We take responsible attitudes toward our commitments to volunteers, beneficiaries, and society as a whole.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Our team consists of professionals from various fields united by a common desire to change the world for the better. We combine expertise in technology, social work, management, and communications to create the most effective platform for volunteering.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.intro: Contact us if you have questions or suggestions. We are always happy to help and hear your thoughts.
contacts.thankYou: Thank you for your message. Our team will review it shortly and contact you.

common.checkBackLater: Check back later or create a new project.
